card.title: Final Fantasy IX
card.text: Hello. My name is Christie Reindle. I'm a developer and I love games. Enjoy my favorite scene in Final Fantasy IX with Alexa

voice.intro: Hello. My name is Christie Reindle. I'm a developer and I love games. Enjoy my favorite scene in Final Fantasy IX with Alexa.

card.title: Alexandria Under Attack
card.text:
Kuja
"What an auspicious day for Alexandria. Garnet's ascension to the throne has brought hope and peace to this kingdom." 
"The people are overjoyed; they believe a wonderful future is ahead of them." 
"...But the celebration isn't over yet." 
"It's time to really light things up!" 
"Your former master is here, Bahamut. Play a requiem for her and all of Alexandria!"

Bahamut is summoned and viciously attacks Alexandria while Kuja smiles.

voice.intro:

card.title: Beatrix & Steiner in Alexandria
card.text:
Steiner and Beatrix charge to Alexandria; a Mistodon chases children. Steiner and Beatrix  run on the scene.
 
"This is it, Beatrix." 
 
"I will give my all for Alexandria!" 
 
"Well said! Let us march on to victory!"

voice.intro:
Steiner and Beatrix charge to Alexandria; a Mistodon chases children. Steiner and Beatrix  run on the scene.
 
"This is it, Beatrix." 
 
"I will give my all for Alexandria!" 
 
"Well said! Let us march on to victory!"

card.title: Pluto Knights Assemble!
card.text:
"HURRY UP, YOU FOOLS!" 
"This is an emergency!" 
"Get your act together before the princess arrives!" 
"Line up!!!"

voice.intro:
"HURRY UP, YOU FOOLS!" 
"This is an emergency!" 
"Get your act together before the princess arrives!" 
"Line up!!!"

card.title: Protect the Townspeople
card.text: Steiner and Beatrix salute Dagger and run off

voice.intro: Steiner and Beatrix salute Dagger and run off

card.title: Portrait of her mother
card.text:
"...Everyone's gone." 
"I don't know what to do..." 
[She looks up at a portrait of her mother] 
"Mother...I need your help." 

[Blue light is charged to her; she falls unconscious]

Say "go back"

card.title: Beatrix and Steiner
card.text:
"Beware, Beatrix! The enemy is close!" 

Mistodon jumps from the top of the house to the two of them. Battle vs. Mistodon. They defeat it and head for the next screen. A Mistodon walks on

"You wish to fight us!? You despicable beast!"

Another one walks on from the other side. Beatrix faces it

"For Her Highness!" 

"For the princess!"

voice.intro:

card.title: Next Battle
card.text:
Battle vs. Mistodon. It dies 

"Beatrix, are you alright?" 

"I'm fine. What about you?" 
"You're wounded!" 

"It's just a scratch."

A mistodon walks on

"Persistent bastards!" 

Battle vs. Mistodon

voice.intro:
Battle vs. Mistodon. It dies

"I'm fine. What about you?" 
"You're wounded!" 

"It's just a scratch."

A mistodon walks on

"Persistent bastards!" 

Battle vs. Mistodon

card.title: Protection
card.text:
"This is futile! Let us return to the castle!" 

"No! I cannot face the princess until we destroy all these beasts. On my honor, I vow to protect the princess, the citizens of Alexandria, and..." 
"Beatrix! I...I shall protect you!" 

"Steiner..." 
A mistodon walks on screen 

"Watch out!" 

Battle vs. Mistodon

voice.intro:

"Steiner..."

card.title: Valediction
card.text:
"...This might be it for us!" 

"I have no regrets!" 

Two mistodons come on screen

"Beatrix... There is something I must tell you!" 

"What is it?" 

"I..." 

"Save your valediction, Steiner. We'll live to see another day." 

Battle vs. Two Mistodons

card.title: Final Card
card.text:
Thank you so much for exploring my skill! I hope this encouraged you to either play the game or want to become a developer yourself! 

Thank you Amazon for the Echo Dot, Final Fantasy Worlds Apart (site) for providing the script, and Square Enix for creating one of the best games ever!
